stationnetwork module

class stationnetwork.StationNetwork(stations_file)[source]

Bases: Graph

Class representing the whole network of Stations. It inherits all properties from Graph class. Its basic building blocks are instances of Station, which in turn inherit from Vertex. Thus graph algorithms such as Dijkstra also work with this class

Attributes

stations_filestr

path to file with information about the network of stations each line being in the following format: Station1 ID, Station2 ID, distance

stat_listdict

equivalent of vert_list in Graph for instances of Station

Methods

add_edge(f, t, weight=1, symmetric=False)[source]

Overrides Graph’s add_edge method such that it also creates connections between instances of Station

Parameters

fstr

ID of first station

tstr

ID of other station

weightint

in case of Stations - represents distance in minutes

symmetricbool

makes the connection directional or non-directional

add_station(stat_id)[source]

Creates instance of Station with given ID and adds it stat_list

Parameters

stat_idstr

unique station ID

create_network()[source]

Creates the network using stations_file given at initialization

get_station(stat_id)[source]

Station equivalent of get_vertex

Parameters

stat_idstr

ID of station

get_stations()[source]

Station equivalent of get_vertices

is_empty()[source]

Invokes is_empty method on all Stations in stat_list, if all are empty returns True, returns False otherwise

num_packages_left()[source]

Returns the number of packages left in network

reset_packages()[source]

Invokes reset_packages method on all Stations in stat_list

update_packages(clock)[source]

Invokes update_packages method on all Stations in stat_list
